newsitem.title: BULGARIA: NO CORPORATE STOCKS TRADE ON BULGARIA BOURSE.
newsitem.headline: NO CORPORATE STOCKS TRADE ON BULGARIA BOURSE.

text.p: No corporate stocks traded on the Sofia Stock Exchange (SSE) for a fourteenth day in a row and the RABSI (Reuter All Bulgaria Stock Index) was unchanged from Wednesday's 41.31 points, brokers said.
No repo deals in treasury paper were struck on the SSE either. Wednesday's repo turnover amounted to 1.225 million levs, said traders.
The other local bourse, the Bulgarian Stock Exchange (BSE) has been in a summer recess since August 5 and will resume trading on September 2. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569
